marketplaces.name: yasanglass
marketplaces.repo_description: Personal plugin marketplace for Claude Code and other compatible agents.

files.README.md:
# Agent Plugin Marketplace

My personal plugin marketplace for [Claude Code](https://claude.com/product/claude-code) (and other compatible agents).

## Installation

### Claude Code

#### Marketplace

```sh
/plugin marketplace add yasanglass/agent-plugin-marketplace
```

#### Local

Add the plugin contents to your `.claude` folder.

## Plugins

### [kotlin-skills](plugins/kotlin-skills)

```sh
/plugin install kotlin-skills@yasanglass
```

### [kotlin-koin-skills](plugins/kotlin-koin-skills)

```sh
/plugin install kotlin-koin-skills@yasanglass
```

plugins.name: kotlin-koin-skills
plugins.description: Skills for Koin dependency injection in Kotlin.
